executable.title: Extract Nrrd Index
executable.description: This program will extract a 3D image (single vector) from a vector 3D image at a given vector index.
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this version of the GTRACT program was provided by NIH/NINDS R01NS050568-01A2S1
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Vincent Magnotta and Greg Harris.

image.name: inputVolume
image.description: Required: input file containing the vector that will be extracted
image.label: Vector Image Volume

integer.name: vectorIndex
integer.description: Index in the vector image to extract
integer.label: Index Into Vector Image

string-enumeration.name: setImageOrientation
string-enumeration.description: Sets the image orientation of the extracted vector (Axial, Coronal, Sagittal)
string-enumeration.label: Index Into Vector Image

parameters.label: Output File
parameters.description: Output file containing the extracted vector in NRRD file form

image.name: outputVolume
image.description: Required: name of output NRRD file containing the vector image at the given index
image.label: Output Volume

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
